definition: to reap where one has not sown (idiom)
surname Zuo
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
to enjoy/to benefit/to have the use of
his/her/its/their/that/such/it (refers to sth preceding it)
surname Cheng
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: Explain what a free rider is and how that concept is related to environmental law.
sentences.chinese: 解釋什麼是坐享其成並且那個概念怎麼與環境法有關。

sentences.english: They, the long-term investors, are gainers who reap where they don't sow.
sentences.chinese: 我們這一羣長期投資人，是少數坐享其成的獲利者。

sentences.english: Never entertain the illusion that you could get paid for nothing.
sentences.chinese: 永遠不要心存坐享其成的幻想。

sentences.english: It's not a match between a team that needs to win and a team that can sit back and wait.
sentences.chinese: 這場比賽不會是一邊急需勝利，另一邊可以坐享其成。

sentences.english: It is the right thing to do, but it won't be a free ride.
sentences.chinese: 這是正確的事，但我們不能坐享其成。

definition: to reap without sowing (idiom)
to have a clear conscience/to have no qualms about sth
lit. just sitting and eating, one can deplete even a mountain of wealth (idiom)/fig. to spend one's money without generating any income
delighted to (do sth, idiom)/perfectly happy to do/most willing to do
to live comfortably/happy and prosperous life
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
one's utmost/(to fight or work) desperately hard/to put up a life or death struggle/at all costs
to have no aspirations (idiom)/unambitious
to take things as they are (idiom)/to leave a situation as it is/to be happy with the status quo
everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary
to tax one's mind and body/demanding (work)/dedicated (worker)/hard-working
to throw one's life in for/to haplessly give one's life for/to sacrifice oneself torturously working for another or for a group/to pour in one's utmost effort/to shed one's last ounce of strength for
to make oneself scarce/to slip away/to take French leave
pinyin: pai1 pai1 pi4 gu5 zou3 ren2

definition: in the end/finally/as a result
to love ease and comfort and hate work (idiom)
to be shortsighted
